eynald was a duck-breeder from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Reynald was a beloved family man, a father and a husband, who perished in the , shortly before the armies of the Cult of the Absolute attacked the city of Baldurs Gate. Reynalds tombstone was commissioned to be carved by Candulhallows Tombstones in the Lower City. The freshly-carved grave marker was stored in Candulhallows workshop. It read "Beloved Reynald. Father, husband, duck-breeder. Gone too soon."
